comments:
Build: Build id: 200210171646 (2.1)

I got the following exception when viewing the Extensions tab of a plugin.xml 
file I was editing. After this, the properites view would no longer update with 
the selection of entries in the plugin.xml manifest editor. The error happened 
shortly after I generated a new PDE project. However, I have not been able to 
reproduce it so I'm not sure what the actual triggering sequence was. 
Restarting Eclipse fixed the properties view.
